plot: The film recounts of the indignities and abuses the five Pandav brothers and their wife Draupadi have to undergo during their one year in exile incognito and also their greatness even under the trying conditions of their lives.
title: Pandav Banvas
plot_es: The film recounts of the indignities and abuses the five Pandav brothers and their wife Draupadi have to undergo during their one year in exile incognito and also their greatness even under the trying conditions of their lives.
